title: Bella Thorne gets death threats from 1D fans on Instagram | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The singer and the music mogul held auditions in 2015 to create a new band, dubbed the female version of One Direction, with Cowell enthusing how talented the girls are. But it was Bella's s comment that fans latched onto instead of the girls in the picture, racking up countless angry replies. Don't mess with Louis! The former Disney star, 19, was told to 'leave', 'get out', and 'stay in your damn lane' by hundreds of furious social media users after simply commenting, 'Awwww', on the pop hunk's latest picture New girl band? Louis - who recently split from girlfriend Danielle Campbell - appeared to have teased the line-up for the mysterious girl group he is managing with Syco boss Simon Cowell in the offending photograph 'Awww': But it was Bella's s comment that fans latched onto instead of the girls in the picture, racking up countless angry replies Some more sinister messages saw the actress told to 'die' and she was even warned, '1D fandom will kill!!!' Bella was also likened to 'Taylor Swift 2.0' complete with numerous snake emojis, a symbol posted relentlessly on pop princess Taylor's account during her feud with Kanye West and Kim Kardashian last year. Other fans also told her to back off because Louis was 'gay with Harry Styles', referring to the popular fan theory of supporting 'Larry Stylinson' - believing that Louis and band mate Harry are secretly in a relationship - which the boys have strenuously denied over the years. 'I warn you': Some more sinister messages saw the actress told to 'die' and she was even warned, '1D fandom will kill!!!' Snake? Bella was also likened to 'Taylor Swift 2.0' complete with numerous snake emojis, a symbol posted relentlessly on pop princess Taylor's account last year Defending their territory: 'Stay in your damn lane' was a popular insult 'Go away': Bella, who has shed her squeaky clean image over the past few months, was told she wasn't welcome to comment Don't Steal My (Boy): Fans accused The Duff actress of trying to make a pass at Louis Some fans tried to diffuse the situation, reminding everyone to calm down and stop sending her abuse. One rationalised, 'If you believe he's so happily taken, there's no need to be threatened, right?' One Direction fans needn't worry, however, since Bella was seen spending time with a mystery man on Valentine's Day, and was recently linked to Sam Pepper. Chill: Some fans tried to diffuse the situation, reminding everyone to calm down and stop sending her abuse No need to worry: Hundreds of comments made reference to the popular fan theory of supporting 'Larry Stylinson' - believing that Louis and band mate Harry are secretly in a relationship Hot debate: 1D fans are divided over the Larry Stylinson conspiracy theory, which the boys have strenuously denied over the years The Duff star was initially linked to 27-year-old Pepper after she appeared in one of his posts to Snapchat. The image shows her standing in front of a mirror that has 'You so pretty' written on it in lipstick, with Sam having written 'True' on the snap. In another image, the pair appear to be holding hands in a bed. Bella is no stranger to death threats, having been cyberbullied after she split from Tyler Posey and immediately was photographed with Charlie Puth. Hiatus: The chart-topping boyband - Harry, Liam Payne, Louis and Niall Horan - are currently pursuing solo projects She explained that her followers thought - wrongly - that she'd cheated on Teen Wolf star Tyler - whom she dated after the end in August of her year-long romance with actor Sulkin - with singer Puth, 25. 'I was getting death threats for a hot minute because they thought I had cheated on my ex, which is a total lie,' she told People magazine. 'When I woke up that morning — it f***ing sucks,' she said. 'It doesn’t feel good to think that everybody in the world just thinks you’re an absolutely disgusting person and just because I’m somebody where people know my name, it’s so much worse for me.' In demand: One Direction fans needn't worry, however, since Bella was seen spending time with a mystery man on Valentine's Day, and was recently linked to Sam Pepper Single again: Louis' ex Danielle Campbell was spotted at New York Fashion Week, attending the Vivienne Tam show in style Meanwhile, Louis' ex Danielle was spotted at New York Fashion Week, attending the Vivienne Tam show in style. The Originals actress looked incredible in a butterfly embellished dress, cinching the quirky lace number in at the waist with a studded belt. Louis tragically lost his mother Johannah Deakin to leukaemia in December and split from Danielle shortly afterwards. Insiders insist there is 'no bad feeling' between them and the pair still remain friends.
